Label: Room5
Description: You're now in a room glistening with gold and silver. There's an exit to south, where you came from. There's a big chest of treasure up ahead on a pedestal.

Items.Name: Treasure
Items.Description: With this in hand, you can win the game. Wonder what it is! Probably a fancy hat.

UniqueActions.Text: Treasure chest has already been plundered. By you! Good for you!
It says 'Feed me a wallet'. Huh. Weird, right?
You say hello to the chest and try to strike up a conversation about sports. It does not work. The chest is not amused.
You haphazardly shake the chest. It rattles and clanks a bit, but doesn't do much of note.
The chest gobbles up your gun when it is presented. It snarls at you menacingly. Wanton violence has finally failed to solve a problem!
The chest gobbles up your wallet when it is presented. Its hunger has subsided it looks like!
There's a partially digested wallet inside underneath where the treasure was sitting. You should just leave that there.

You open up the treasure chest and take out the ambiguous treasure within! Civilization will surely be saved now!
You could probably press 'q' to quit the game and exit the dungeon happily now!
As you attempt to open the chest, it suddenly opens up and bites you, taking a limb off of you. Whoopsie!
